segments.text: Looking around the kitchen, I feel a sense of normalcy at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see that steady stream of water, and it makes my heart sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t understand why she isn’t noticing the mess right at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy's ambition is admirable, but foolish too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s almost got his hand on the edge of the cookie jar now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has that look of sheer hope; it’s bittersweet to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so caught up in their excitement that they don’t realize the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they even consider the consequences of their little heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a little play happening in the middle of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How is it that the outside garden remains so calm, while we brace for an accident inside?
segments.speaker: PAR
